title: august 10: the notorious RBG
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the life of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg. After, she reflects on the Katy Perry song “I Kissed a Girl.” Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
